application.name: trackextract
application.brief: Removes the tracking band from a mosaic and places it into a new tracking cube.
application.description: Updates an old mosaic cube with a tracking band by removing the tracking band and table and placing them into a separate tracking cube. A reference to the tracking cube is added to the mosaic label. We also have to update the tracking cube's pixels by subtracting the offsett ProcessMosaic adds to each pixel and adding the new offset, the minimum value of an unsigned integer. ProcessMosaic also sets pixels that are not from any cube to a default value. If a pixel has this value, we set it to Null.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.description: The mosaic that contains the tracking band to be extracted.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: There will be two output cubes: the mosaic cube and the tracking cube, both named by the user, but the tracking cube will have "_tracking" appended onto the name.
